replies.body: The LCS playoffs look like they're going to be pretty interesting, but Personally I expect to see Fnatic in the finals especially with an extra week of preparation. They seem to have come out and absolutely destroyed teams whenever they've had adequate preparation (EL week 1, first match vs SK, last match vs H2K). Unfortunately I expect SK to roll over UOL, but who knows what will happen with that team. NA IMO will be a bit closer and harder to predict with Liquid finally looking like they know what they want to play, but I still expect C9 to take it 3-2. TIP vs TSM will be interesting seeing as TSM may not be ale to afford to leave Dyrus alone like they often do as Impact and Rush look to be the strongest part of TIP's lineup.
Nah C9 will beat Curse 3-0 and TSM will beat LMQ 3-2 :P

You know until LMQ (lol TiP) Rush over Bjergerking with an aggressive and farm heavy XwX. I expect it will be a great match.

The second playoff, I see TL and C9 going the distance and I hope TL can keep what they had against CLG (BronzeAgeConfirmed) and it could be an awesome game. TL/C9 vs TiP in the Finals. Predicted. (50/50 c9/TL)

Fnatic won't make it to Finals. H2K vs UoL in the finals. Predicted.
I think they should hacer called themselves the challenger age maybe then they wouldn't have played like gold players lol
I see TSM in the finals, but TL or C9 I honestly can't predict. TL looked amazing against CLG, and C9 has been way too inconsistent.

I do definitely agree with you that C9 is better but with Liquid looking better in as a team I can't help but feel they'll take at least 1 game off C9. TSM are my pick to win in the other Semi as I think they'll be more prepared with that extra week and will likely be able to prevent the game from turning into looking like a solo queue game like Game 4 vs Gravity. I just feel it could really snowball out of control for TSM if they aren't able to keep Impact and Rush from gaining a lead too quickly
TL 4th RIP
If TL lose their semifinal match they stay 4ever4th and the curse will never be broken no matter how hard they try {{summoner:3}}
I really want to see the curse broken would be cool to see a TSM liquid final
While I am a C9 fan, I still think it would be hilarious and amazing to see a final between TiP and TL.
4th is their birthright

Its like people are blind too how good fnatic actually is....I guess its possible h2k could upset them but imo I think anyone beating fnatic in this playoffs including sk gaming would be a upset.  Fnatic should win it all.  They are the strongest team in eu imo.  I guess we will see soon enough.
Fnatic right now are insanely good, they have an incredible raw talent and a very vetaran captain. They can win this split.
I think they'll win as long as they make it out of the laning phase without being very far behind
I think Gravity should be above CLG. They just looked stronger during their playoff match

CLG is a better team than gravity, and they beat them twice to show it. CLG just looked horrible in the playoffs and in there match against TiP. I'd say CLG is better, but they didn't show that in the playoffs.

CLGs lack of team fight should make it so they are not even on the list. The only way they win is if they get and keep an early lead.

If they go even or do not have a high enough lead. They lose.
Didnt TSM beat CJ lol wtf is this
In a best of 1, during a slump...
WE also beat CJ, then TSM Smashed WE after WE beat GET. I'd say TSM should definitely be above CJ.

WE beat GET, and TSM beat WE and CJ, but lost to UOL. 

My point is that your logic doesn't work
His logic works a lot better than yours.... You don't compare 2 different tournaments especially not when they were 4 months apart.
CJ ENTUS IS BETTER THAN SNAKE?! SKT IS BETTER THAN VICI AND SNAKE?! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAH

Hello all caps. It might appear to you that SKT and CJ being better than Snake is a surprise. However, Vici has been peaking only recently, Snake has always been a mid-high team in China (and i mean really, they're nothing special). SKT looks awesome as of late, and while I can't argue for CJ, Space and CoCo seem to finally be getting some champs into their champ pool.

A reasonable voice on Power Rankings? What is this!?!?!

Back to the topic on hand. Snake has been mediocre in terms of playstyle. I firmly agree with OHminus about the Vici peaking. They have just recently started to look like they could contend for top 2 CN. 

My beef with these rankings are  TSM's rank. Jeez please get off the IEM Koolaid. It is getting old to see people say "well TSM won IEM, TSM is the best team in the world". 

Next  Yoe Flash Wolves and Fnatic's rankings. Actually, everything from 12 down. All of those rankings are fubar and Riot should feel bad about them.  If you are going to have TSM/C9 up that high. H2K (best team EU?) up there as well. SK maybe, but their style is going to be completely outclassed come international play (its sad right EU Fanboys). And Fnatic, may not see much of international play if they don't take Semis seriously.

Overall I agree with some of the rankings. Most of them are just baseless and complete made up to "support" region diversity.
Wait, what? How is the ,,International,, standings works? Why YFW is better than TiP, FNC or SK? It's very weird for me.
They ranked YFW higher because SK lost the wrong game against them at IEM. Their record is still 1:1, but Riot doesn't really care about such small details like that.

Honestly to me the weird part was not just them being placed above sk, but under c9. 1-0 vs C9, but only 1-1 vs SK, so they should either be placed above both or below both (which I am more in favor of).
I never understand how they manage to alway screw up the international rankings. Literally every week.

Riots completely illusionary idea of Regional Diversity. While I am not one to say "KR>CN>NA>BR>EU" I'm not completely delusional in my ideals that BR could be any KR team or Fnatic/TSM could beat EDG.

I think Power Rankings like this are less about accuracy and more about promoting inter-regional competition and "hype" about teams. Especially for people that watch the regions (Trololo Hong Kong Esports and Yoe Flash Wolves)
EDG PawN shall win worlds twice in a row
Just wait, Uzi and Friends. 3-peat (for 2nd place)
TSM/C9 in the Grand Finals.
I don't think TSM can handle the TiP. Just imagine if they have to take the whole thing and not just the TiP.
Looks like TSM could handle TIP afterall.

1st: TSM 2nd: TL 3rd: TIP 4th: C9. One good week for C9 isn't enough to convince me they're better after a split of relative mediocrity. I have always thought of TL as a top three team even in their dark moments on the standings.

1st: FNC 2nd: SK 3rd: H2K 4th: UOL. Unless SK have some alternative strategies (finally) I can't see them taking games in BO5s vs the likes of FNC. They're the best team in Europe when the greek is on Graves and Lucian, otherwise they're scrappy.

Unicorns skill in Bo3/5s will be make for a good series' but I just can't see them taking down prolly's posse with their laning + rotational edge. It will be on POE to prove me wrong.
A split of mediocrity that landed them in 2nd place on the split? Makes sense...
Words right out of my head. I don't see why people think just because they are not 1st they are mediocre? They pulled it up enough weeks. I see TL v c9  is gonna be good.
I agree with your rankings on EU but I hope UOL can pull some of that unpredictability to offset SK and go to the finals
I love how everyone last year was saying Apollo was so bad and now he's doing consistently very well against every team.
Fnatic over TiP? Yeah, no. I understand Fnatic's new roster is young, but they have an impressive raw talent, and a vetaran captain.
man what happened to OMG?

Considering the talent they boast on their roster they should be closer to EDG than they are and are dropping games against teams far inferior to them. I hope They figure it out as each of their individual players can really turn it on, but right now they're just not living up to expectations

They lack consistency and only are struggling against teams they should man handle (See OMG vs EP). This can be contributed to teams in China as a whole seeming to use the Series of 2 style to only play seriously for a single game and use the other one to as a scrim style with Troll Picks and Testing Ground for "interesting" picks.
Seriously. I hate the 2 game series thing, it has been affecting how teams play and its just a wierd point system overall.
Well if you think about it they have 12 teams and they are afraid of the Best of 3. Just think of the number of games (they already play an extraordinary amount)

Why is TSM above C9 when in their most recent head to head C9 beat them? And why are the Yoe Flash Wolves above SK Gaming? Sure, they reached further in the IEM tournament than SK, but their record is still 1:1. If the playoff spot was a best of 3 match anything could have happened. Yoe managed to take a game off TSM too, but it doesn't seem to have been taken into account. I don't think those analysts are really trying to make a good ranking.
...There's a team named Gaming Gaming?  I need that icon, stat.

ouch rito gems

leave clg alone lol
They shouldn't even be on the list.
